mapper.insert: INSERT INTO education (EDUCATION_ID, USER_ID, SCHOOL_NAME, STATUS, MAJOR, START_DATE, END_DATE, CERTIFICATE_URL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{EDUCATION_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{SCHOOL_NAME}, #{STATUS}, #{MAJOR}, #{START_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{CERTIFICATE_URL}, #{CREATED_AT}, #{UPDATED_AT})
